creditline: Gift of the Clark Center for Japanese Art & Culture; formerly given to the Center by Audrey Seo and Stephen Addiss
description: twelve lines of angular, evenly spaced calligraphy; long sheet folded into three segments; one square intaglio stamp and one square relief stamp at LL
markings: LLC:  square intaglio; LLC, square relief
signed: L center: [ 嘉永辛亥春二月七十一歳小竹長翁 ]
title: Colophon on five leaves (page two of two)
